name: PostEra
headline: Medicinal Chemistry powered by Machine Learning
description: PostEra is building a modern 21st century biopharma. We're using our advances in machine learning to accelerate Medicinal Chemistry and bring more cures to patients. PostEra advances small molecule programs through partnerships with biopharma while also advancing its own internal pipeline. We've raised $26M from top investors and closed $1Bn in AI partnerships, signing multi-year agreements with Amgen, Pfizer and the NIH. PostEra also launched and led the world's largest open-science drug discovery effort; COVID Moonshot.

# Medicinal Chemistry Powered by Machine Learning
PostEra is building a modern 21st century biopharma. We use Proton, our AI platform for medicinal chemistry, to accelerate the discovery of new medicines for patients. 
![molecule-image](https://postera.ai/static/bb7febb77eea0c09bc6eb0c32fd47b72/74fba/common-molecule.png)

generated_description:
**PostEra: Revolutionizing Drug Discovery with Machine Learning**

Founded in 2019 and hailing from Boston, PostEra is on a mission to modernize biopharmaceutical development through innovative machine learning technologies. With a focus on accelerating medicinal chemistry, PostEra aims to expedite the discovery of new medicines, ultimately delivering more cures to patients faster.

**The Vision and Progress**

PostEra operates at the intersection of artificial intelligence and drug discovery. Their proprietary AI platform, Proton, is the backbone of their approach, enabling rapid advancements in small molecule programs. They’ve forged partnerships with major players in the biopharma sector including Amgen, Pfizer, and the NIH, backing up their ambitious goals with significant financial support—$26 million raised and an impressive $1 billion in AI collaborations.

One of their standout achievements is the COVID Moonshot project, which represents the largest open-science drug discovery effort aimed at tackling the COVID-19 pandemic. This initiative underscores PostEra's commitment not just to technology, but to impactful healthcare solutions.

**Team and Culture**

With a lean team of 34 talented employees and guidance from Group Partner Jared Friedman, PostEra combines entrepreneurial drive with focused expertise. They are part of Y Combinator's Winter 2020 Batch, indicating a recognized potential for growth and innovation in the startup landscape.

**What’s Next?**

PostEra continues to explore new frontiers in drug discovery, working on several internal projects while strategically partnering with established pharmaceutical companies. They are continuously on the lookout for ways to enhance their technology and impact the industry positively.

If you’re passionate about pushing the boundaries of science and technology in healthcare, consider connecting with them or checking out their ongoing projects through their website [PostEra](https://postera.ai/).

In conclusion, PostEra is not just another biotech company; it stands out by harnessing machine learning to truly rethink how new drugs are discovered and developed—promising a healthier future through innovation.
